page.title: 01HISTORY OF SHREWSBURY.
page.content: 32 charters granted between reigns of Henry 1 and James 1. Coat of arms derived from arms of Edward 1, who used town as stronghold against Welsh invasion.1283 he summoned first all people's Parliament in Shrewsbury Abbey.Shrewsbury one of the first boroughs represented in{Parliament. 1403{Battle of Shrewsbury ,unsuccessful rebellion led by Percy Family,recorded as most violent conflict on English soil.1552 Grammar School founded; still famous public school.1796 world's first iron framed building used as Flax mill,now a maltings.Telford, 18th century engineer,county surveyor,constructed London/Holyhead road through town. {Charles Darwin(Origin of Species)}born in Shrewsbury 1809.Shrewsbury's famous annual{Flower Show}founded 1875.
